interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Oversized Triple Milled Bath Soap Bar, Avocado, Large, 8.7 Ounce Review Date: 2018/08/18 Store: Michel Design Works Product Description: ['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Avocado', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL259', 'UPC': '608666698793', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'} Review Text: I like big bars and I cannot lie.
This is rich, luxurious and long lasting.
It makes my skin smell good, feel good and as a bonus the whole bathroom smells good! Review Title: Great BIG bar! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

It feels good on my lips. Gives a nice tint, too. Recommend Mane-ly Long Hair Detangler/Polisher 8oz. Mane-ly Long Hair ['MLH Denatngle/Polisher'] {'Product Benefits': 'Use on a Dirty/Dry or Clean/Wet Mane, Tail, Feathers & Forelock', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.6 x 1.9 x 1.7 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '608729173847', 'Manufacturer': 'TTL', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Used it in my golden retriever. Too oily.
Normally use coconut and it’s good for her (healthy) skin and enjoys it. For my golden I’d not re-order. Lucky Teeth Organic Toothpaste-All Natural, Remineralizes and Fortifies Teeth and Gums. (2 oz 1 Pack) Lucky Teeth {'Brand': 'Lucky Teeth', 'Flavor': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Form': 'Paste', 'Material Type Free': 'Fluoride Free, Gluten Free, Glycerin Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 1.5 x 2.75 inches; 2.56 Ounces', 'UPC': '636160246936', 'Manufacturer': 'Lucky Teeth'} This toothpaste is good. That said, I got what I paid for here. It’s not anything earth shattering, it won’t make your teeth any cleaner than another toothpaste, help your gums heal, etc. but it IS a healthier choice! For that I give it 4 thoughtful stars. Tastes good as well. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.'] {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Avocado', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL259', 'UPC': '608666698793', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'} I like big bars and I cannot lie.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Affinity:** The user continues to show a strong preference for lip care products and has expanded their interest to include luxurious bath soaps, indicating a desire for high-quality bathing experiences. Their exploration of hair care products, particularly detanglers and polishers, remains ongoing, coupled with an interest in holistic oral care.

- **Ingredients & Formulations:** They favor versatile products across categories, emphasizing natural ingredients and healthier alternative choices. Their recent purchase reflects a growing appreciation for quality in personal care items.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user is particularly attentive to sensory attributes, enjoying rich textures and pleasant fragrances. Their latest purchase exemplifies their preference for luxurious sensory experiences that enhance both personal care and ambiance.

- **Positive Engagement:** They maintain a discerning approach, appreciating value in products that prioritize health and sensory delight, even if not all meet performance expectations.

- **Brand Loyalty:** Strong loyalty to effective brands persists, but the user remains open to trying new products that align with their quality and health standards.

- **Overall Rating Trend:** Maintaining an optimistic outlook on cosmetic products, they have become more selective overall, demonstrating thoughtful consideration in their interactions and ratings across beauty and personal care categories. Their recent experiences suggest a willingness to embrace quality over quantity, focusing on enriching their personal care routine.
